article.headline: Liberty 109, South Virginia 64
article.story: LYNCHBURG, Va. (AP) -- Larry Blair had 18 points to lead five Liberty players in double figures as the Flames beat Southern Virginia 109-64 Monday night. Alex McLean had 15 of his 17 points in the first half, but the others turned on after the break. Anthony Smith had 11 of his 17 in the second half, B.J. Jenkins had 13 of his 16 in the second and Tyler Baker scored 10 of his 13 after halftime. Damien Hubbard added a career-high 12 rebounds for Liberty (3-1), which outrebounded Southern Virginia 61-22. Blair scored nine during a 16-4 Liberty run that put the Flames up 86-49 with 5:54 remaining. Liberty finished on an 11-2 run. The Flames jumped ahead 7-0 then later used an 11-0 run to go up 29-12 with 8:14 left in the half. Liberty extended that to a 26-4 run that put the Flames ahead by 28 with 2:59. The Knights closed out the half on 11-2 run to close the gap to 46-27. Tanner Johnson led Southern Virginia (4-7) with 18, and Dallas Rivera added 13. Liberty outscored the Knights 52-24 in the paint and had 46 points from nonstarters, compared to 19 for Southern Virginia. Liberty shot about 57 percent, while Southern Virginia struggled from the field with 31 percent shooting. Liberty coach Randy Dunton recorded his 100th career collegiate win.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
